name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for the best shopping prices

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension can find best price for shopping on all over the online shopping Mall.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search for the best shopping prices is a simple yet powerful extension to search multiple sites with one click. You can compare the price in all online shopping platforms



FEATURES
---------------------------------------
  - Simple and fast UI for quick searches
  - support shortcut search.
  - support drag and drop search.
  - support Selection Search & Copy.
  - support right mouse button search.
  - Users can also customize the search engine
  - With the search group function, users can search for content in multiple different search engines at once

Direct option for search in shopping site like amazon,aliexpress,ebay.Have a try.
